title: FIFA World Cup 2014 Brazil total costs
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Breakdown of Projects.
Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation has the highest Costs in million U.S. dollars and Tourism infrastructure projects has the lowest Costs in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation has 3524.0 more Costs in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Costs in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Breakdown of Projects.

The maximum Costs in million U.S. dollars 3600.0 is found at Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation and the minimum is found at Tourism infrastructure projects where Breakdown of Project is 76.0.
Breakdown of Project Urban mobility projects has the second highest value for Costs in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 3524.0 between the maximum Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation and minimum Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects.

The Breakdown of Project Stadium construction & renovation has the highest Costs in million U.S. dollars, followed by Urban mobility projects, and Upgrades at airports. Down to the Breakdown of Project Tourism infrastructure projects which is the lowest.
The highest value 3600.0 at Stadium construction & renovation is almost 2.62 times larger than the average value 1372.62.
The Costs in million U.S. dollars is 10981.0 if we add up values of all Breakdown of Projects.
